channel.title: I Need Help With D Claws Spec
channel.description:
Ok, as the title says I need help iwth a dragon claw spec.
I followed this TuT (http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,339514.0.html)
But I couldn't find the next step after 5.
If anyone would like to help me you can talk to me on msn(stlz_bosnain@hotmail.com) also anyone that adds me don't make fun of my name. I've had assholes in the past add me on msn and i don't even know who they are and they would make fun of it.
Ok, back on topic if you know post here or talk on msn.
Thank You

item.title: I Need Help With D Claws Spec
item.dc:creator: @powerknite7 powerknite7
item.description:
@powerknite7 wrote:

d claw spec 4 hit(delte shoud work with others2)
look for this in client.java

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 8100

paste the next code under that.

} if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 8002 && specialAmount > 8){ specialAtkNPC(true, 75, 282, 2068); getHit(8); usingSpecial = true; }
look for this(stil client.java)

degradeCrystalShield()

paste this under it

} if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 8002 && specialAmount > 8){ specialAtkNPC(true, 75, 282, 2068); getHit(8); usingSpecial = true; }
then look for this

I'm already under attack(stil client.java)

} if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 8002 && specialAmount > 8){ specialAtkNPC(true, 75, 282, 2068); getHit(8); usingSpecial = true; }
then look for this

int[] two_hand

and add 8002 (makes u can not wear a shield+claws)
next go to special.java
contrl + f

4151whip code yust pres an enter afther 4151
and add

                case 8002:

do this everywhere , until it says cannot find 4151(normal that is 2 items)
shoud work goodluck .

Read full topic
